definitions.definition: A statement of a belief or a summary statement of a whole belief system ; also ( metonymically ) the belief or belief system itself.
The liturgical creed (usually the Nicene Creed ), or a musical arrangement of it for use in church services .

main_definition: A statement of a belief or a summary statement of a whole belief system ; also ( metonymically ) the belief or belief system itself.
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) The liturgical creed (usually the Nicene Creed ), or a musical arrangement of it for use in church services .
